Label.Text: leafChat can display notification popups that alert you to events.
These can help you notice hard-to-spot messages, such as when the window is minimized.
On Mac OS X, notification popups are displayed via the Growl system extension.
Growl is installed and working. Please use Growl preferences, available via System Preferences, to enable or disable notifications.
leafChat cannot communicate with Growl due to a system problem. You will not receive popup notifications.
Growl is not installed. If you'd like popup notifications, please install Growl, available from http://www.growl.info/.
Growl also adds notifications to many other programs such as Firefox 3.
An unexpected error occurred when initialising Growl. You will not receive popup notifications.
Unfortunately, notification support requres Java version 1.6 (aka Java 6).
You may be able to obtain the latest Java version from <url>http://www.java.com/</url>.
Unfortunately, your Java 1.6 runtime does not support desktop notification (java.awt.SystemTray). Popup notifications are not available on your platform.
